Global Rumen Bypass Fat Market Key Driver:
Improving Mandate for Animal Protein to Drive Market Growth – The animal-based proteins typically comprise a good amount of protein, attracting consumers and resulting in the high adoption of animal-derived products such as milk & meat. The rumen bypasses fat or rumen-protected fat and is developed to improve the energy density of the animal diet, which can digest in the lower-digest tract of ruminants such as sheep, beef cattle, and dairy cows.
As the population is increasing globally, so does the demand for animal-derived products. Hence, to fulfill this demand, the dairy & meat industries are focusing on different ways to optimize their operations, in which rumen bypass fat plays a crucial role in improving milk production and reproduction efficiency.
